sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import {go, stop} from '../actions'; const Controller = ({dispatch, intersection}) => { const handleGo = (e) => { const direction = e.target.innerHTML const payload = {} payload[direction] = 'green' dispatch(go()) } const handleStop = (e) => { const direction = e.target.innerHTML const payload = {} payload[direction] = 'red' dispatch(stop()) } return (

N: {intersection.north}

E: {intersection.east}

S: {intersection.south}

W: {intersection.west}

) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => {(intersection: state.intersection)} export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Controller)
